content: This guide is for individuals or businesses who want to improve their visibility and ranking on Google search engine through Search Engine Optimization (SEO). It covers the basics of SEO, including understanding indexing and crawling, the role of Googlebot, and how to optimize a website for better search engine performance. It also provides tips on how to get a site indexed by Google and troubleshoot common issues that prevent a site from being indexed. The guide emphasizes the importance of creating a user-friendly website and using relevant keywords to improve search engine visibility.
